short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically creates a bookmark for the next UFC wikipedia page. Removes bookmarks for past events as well.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically finds the next UFC wikipedia page and creates a bookmark in your bookmark toolbar. Once an event has passed, it will remove the bookmark and then create a new bookmark for the next one(give it a few hours to update the new bookmark after an event has passed).
